attributes.action: stop the expansion of Stansted Aiport immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Department for Communities and Local Government has ignored the very people it is meant to serve.

The Local Government has denied BAA's expansion plans for its environmental damage. The public inquiry inspector agreed with this assesment.

The DCLG states that the expansion affecting the environment will "likely to be very small". Considering the added air pollution from cars and planes, this is a complete and utter mistruth.

The DCLG also ignores the Communities (which it is meant to serve) that will be destroyed by this disasterous move.

The DCLG is really the Department Against Communities and Local Government.
